titles.title: Honoring the 50th anniversary of the Joint Center for Political and Economic Studies.
Honoring the 50th anniversary of the Joint Center for Political and Economic Studies.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues
Emergency medical services and trauma care
Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary: This resolution honors the Joint Center for Political and Economic Studies and reaffirms the commitment of the House of Representatives to working alongside the center and others to advance ideas and policies that promote, uplift, and enrich the Black community and all of America.
